title: User Registration Success
description: Validate successful user registration with valid inputs for all required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid username, email, password, and select role.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user is successfully registered and receives confirmation.

title: User Registration Input Validation
description: Ensure the registration form validates inputs and handles invalid data correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input invalid email format and weak password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify appropriate error messages are displayed preventing registration.

title: User Login Success with Correct Credentials
description: Check that login succeeds with valid username/email and password, issuing JWT.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful authentication and JWT token issuance.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify the system blocks login attempts with invalid credentials and shows error.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input incorrect username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails with appropriate error message.

title: JWT Authentication and Role Enforcement
description: Validate authenticated routes enforce JWT tokens and role-based access control for Reporter, Analyst, and Admin.

steps.description: Login as different user roles.
Attempt to access restricted backend APIs and UI pages for each role.
Verify access is granted or denied appropriately based on user role and JWT.

title: Incident Submission Via URL with AI Threat Analysis and DNS Verification
description: Test multi-channel reporting by submitting a URL incident, triggering AI analysis, DNS lookup, and reachability check.

steps.description: Login as Reporter.
Navigate to incident submission page.
Select URL incident type and input valid suspicious URL.
Submit the incident.
Verify AI threat analysis is performed with risk score (0-100) and severity classification displayed.
Verify DNS verification and HTTP reachability checks are completed and reflected in the incident details.
Verify incident is saved to database with all relevant metadata.

title: Incident Submission Via SMS with AI Analysis and Pattern Detection Fallback
description: Test submission of an SMS-type incident and validate AI analysis along with rule-based fallback detection.

steps.description: Login as Reporter.
Navigate to incident submission page.
Select SMS incident type and input suspicious message content.
Submit the incident.
Verify AI-powered risk scoring and severity assignment.
Verify fallback rule-based pattern detection identifies phishing or urgency triggers if AI inconclusive.

title: Incident Submission Via File Upload with Validation and AI Analysis
description: Test file upload incident reporting flow, including file validation, secure handling, and threat analysis.

steps.description: Login as Reporter.
Navigate to incident submission page.
Upload a supported file type containing suspicious content.
Submit the incident.
Verify file is accepted and scanned securely without vulnerabilities.
Verify AI threat analysis is performed on file content and results displayed.

title: Incident Submission Edge Case: Invalid URL with Failed DNS Lookup
description: Validate incident submission for a URL with invalid domain or unreachable host and proper error reporting.

steps.description: Login as Reporter.
Submit a URL incident with a non-existent domain.
Verify DNS verification fails and appropriate warnings are shown in incident analysis.
Verify the incident can still be submitted with flagged status.

title: Incident Duplicate and Repeat Threat Detection
description: Validate the pattern matching engine accurately clusters duplicates and updates frequency counts for repeated threats.

steps.description: Submit multiple incidents with similar content and domains.
Verify system detects duplicate patterns and updates frequency_count accordingly.

title: Incident Dashboard Filtering and Search
description: Ensure analyst dashboard supports filtering by type, severity, status and search by keywords effectively.

steps.description: Login as Analyst.
Navigate to the incident dashboard.
Apply filters for severity='high' and status='pending'.
Perform a search using keywords from incident content.
Verify displayed results correctly match filters and search criteria.

title: Auto-Escalation Rule Triggering and Notification
description: Test that incidents meeting predefined auto-escalation criteria are marked escalated with alerts sent to CERT.

steps.description: Submit an incident that meets an escalation rule (e.g. critical severity with financial keywords).
Verify incident status changes to escalated automatically.
Verify escalation reason and timestamp are recorded.
Verify notification to CERT or designated authority is dispatched.

title: Detailed Incident View with AI Expert Analysis and Lifecycle Timeline
description: Verify that incident details page displays AI-generated analysis, lifecycle events, and related threat searches correctly.

steps.description: Login as Analyst.
Navigate to a specific incident details page.
Verify AI expert analysis text is displayed with risk score and severity.
Verify incident lifecycle timeline shows events in correct order.
Verify similar threats related to the incident are listed.

title: Fake Army Profile Detection with Confidence Scoring
description: Test the detection system flags fake profiles associated with incidents and returns confidence level and indicators.

steps.description: Submit or review incident with suspicious Army profile.
Verify system provides fake profile detection status.
Verify confidence score (0-100) and detection indicators are displayed.

title: Live Threat Heatmap and Geo-Intelligence Data Display
description: Ensure the live threat heatmap shows regional incidents mapped accurately to the seven Defence Commands with hotspot visualization.

steps.description: Login as Analyst or Admin.
Navigate to the live threat heatmap page/component.
Verify geo-location data points map correctly and heatmap updates in real-time.
Verify regional defence command boundaries and hotspot intensity reflect incident frequency.

title: Bilingual UI Language Toggle Functionality
description: Test the UI language toggle between English and Hindi updates all relevant UI text dynamically.

steps.description: Navigate to any UI page.
Toggle language to Hindi.
Verify all UI text switches correctly to Hindi.
Toggle back to English.
Verify all UI text switches back to English.

title: Theme Toggle Dark/Light Mode
description: Validate that theme toggling switches UI between dark and light themes with correct styling and state persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to any page.
Toggle the theme switch to dark mode.
Verify UI colors and components reflect dark theme styling.
Toggle back to light mode.
Verify UI colors and components reflect light theme styling.

title: File Upload Validation and Error Handling
description: Check that uploading unsupported or invalid files prompts proper error messages without system crashes.

steps.description: Open incident submission page with file upload.
Attempt to upload unsupported file type or corrupted file.
Verify system rejects file and displays meaningful error.

title: QR Code Scanner Component Functionality
description: Validate that QR code scanner detects and inputs valid URLs or incident content correctly.

steps.description: Open incident submission page with QR code scanner.
Scan a QR code with valid URL or incident data.
Verify scanned data populates incident submission fields correctly.
Scan invalid or corrupted QR code.
Verify appropriate error handling occurs.

title: Voice Recorder Component Usage and Submission
description: Test recording functionality, playback, and submission of voice data in incident reporting.

steps.description: Open incident submission page.
Start recording voice input.
Stop recording and playback voice to verify.
Submit the voice recording as part of incident.
Verify submission success and that voice data is saved and analyzed.

title: Toast Notifications Display and Behavior
description: Ensure toast notifications appear on user actions such as submission success/failure and auto-dismiss properly.

steps.description: Perform actions like incident submission or login.
Verify toast notification with appropriate message appears.
Verify the toast auto-dismisses after a set timeout.

title: Secured API Access and CORS Configuration
description: Verify backend APIs reject unauthorized access, enforce role permissions and CORS policies function correctly during requests.

steps.description: Send API requests to protected endpoints without JWT.
Verify responses return unauthorized error.
Send API requests with valid JWT but insufficient role permissions.
Verify access denied errors.
Send cross-origin request from unauthorized origin.
Verify CORS policy blocks request.

title: Backend Performance: AI Analysis and Rule-based Threat Scoring
description: Assess backend processing time for AI threat scoring (2-5 seconds) and rule-based scoring (under 500ms).

steps.description: Submit several incidents of various types.
Measure and verify AI analysis completes within 2-5 seconds per incident.
Measure rule-based scoring completes under 500ms.

title: Frontend Load and Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Verify the frontend UI loads under 2 seconds and remains responsive and correctly styled on desktop and mobile browsers.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop and mobile devices.
Measure page load times and verify below 2 seconds.
Verify UI layout, animations, and components function correctly on all tested screen sizes.

title: Bulk Incident Submission API Functionality
description: Test bulk incident upload API to accept multiple incident reports and process them with AI analysis and pattern detection.

steps.description: Prepare a batch of valid incident reports in bulk submission format.
Send bulk submission request to the backend.
Verify all incidents are processed and stored with AI scores and validations.
Verify errors are properly returned for any malformed incidents without affecting successful ones.

title: Weekly Threat Intelligence Summary API Response
description: Verify weekly threat summaries API returns accurate consolidated intelligence data for analyst review.

steps.description: Query the weekly threat summary API endpoint.
Verify response contains summary data in expected format.
Verify intelligence data matches aggregated incidents for the week.
